mapper.insert: insert into ecs_supplier_category (cat_id, cat_name, keywords, cat_desc, parent_id, sort_order, template_file, measure_unit, show_in_nav, style, is_show, grade, filter_attr, supplier_id, is_show_cat_pic, cat_pic, cat_pic_url, cat_goods_limit) values (#{catId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{catName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sortOrder,jdbcType=BIT}, #{templateFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measureUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showInNav,jdbcType=BIT}, #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT}, #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{filterAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isShowCatPic,jdbcType=BIT}, #{catPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catPicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catGoodsLimit,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
